articles.title: 'Barbenheimer' cannot share a screen at Transit Drive In - WGRZ.com
articles.description: The local drive-in posted on Facebook that they could not play the 2 together, but that there would still be fun double feature options for the new movie releases.
articles.content:
LOCKPORT, N.Y. Looking to binge the new movie releases this weekend for Barbie and Oppenheimer?
The Transit Drive In in Lockport will be having both new movies on the big screen this weekend, but it… [+892 chars]
